channel.title: Rest Butten
channel.description:
hey guys, My Rest Butten im trying to get it to Rest for me. So i searched up My run Case ( when i click on Run its case 153 )
How can i make it That when i right click run and Click Rest it rests I have the Gfx. Now how can i create a case for it??
Like this is what i mean
[code=java]Case: 154// rest c.startAnimation(5713);[/code] and it will Rest When u click it. EDIT: Forgot Base pi 317 loading 614

item.title: Rest Butten

item.description:
@Sun_Chips wrote:

Case: 154// rest c.startAnimation(5713); while(energy < 100) {//I don't know the real player's variable its just as an example. energy++; Thread.sleep(20);//some kind of pause here I just used thread.sleep as an example. }
